oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - 1951-02-06 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), Jerry Rivers (performer) and Audrey Williams (performer), on February 6, 1951 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Audrey Williams; Louis Buck; Jerry Rivers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Louis Buck talks -- Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the first tune -- Cold Cold Heart (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks about a snowstorm they just had -- Hank Williams introduces Audrey Williams and the next tune -- Honky Tonkin' (Audrey Williams) -- Hank Williams, Audrey Williams and Louis Buck talk -- Sally Goodin' (Jerry Rivers fiddle, Louis Buck and Hank Williams vocal calls) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Audrey, 1923-1975; Rivers, Jerry, 1928-;
